description: Ghretek Sustratos Inteligentes is an innovative company focused on producing bioproducts and bio-inputs for agriculture by transforming agro-industrial by-products. Founded by a team of experienced entrepreneurs, Ghretek aims to address the needs of the nursery sector, which is crucial for plant multiplication. By developing intelligent substrates tailored to specific plant species, the company promotes sustainable practices and enhances agricultural productivity while contributing to the circular economy through the valorization of waste materials.
name: Ghretek
